mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_service ( service_no, ref_member_no, question_category, question_title, question_content, question_origin_name, question_file_path, question_change_name ) VALUES ( seq_customer_service.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{questionCategory}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{questionOriginName}, #{questionFilePath}, #{questionChangeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_service WHERE ref_member_no LIKE #{memberNo}

SELECT service_no, ref_member_no, member_id, member_nickname, question_category, question_title, question_content, question_origin_name, question_file_path, question_change_name, cs.create_date, question_reply FROM customer_service cs JOIN member m ON ( cs.ref_member_no = m.member_no ) WHERE cs.ref_member_no LIKE #{memberNo} ORDER BY cs.create_date desc
